name: Cardiac Consultation
description: Comprehensive evaluation of heart health including medical history review, physical examination, and diagnostic tests. Our cardiologists provide expert assessment and personalized treatment plans for various heart conditions.

name: Echocardiogram
description: Non-invasive ultrasound procedure that examines the heart's structure and function. This test provides detailed images of the heart's chambers, valves, walls, and blood vessels, helping to diagnose various heart conditions.

name: Pediatric Check-up
description: Comprehensive health assessment for children of all ages. Our pediatricians monitor growth and development, provide immunizations, screen for common childhood conditions, and offer guidance on nutrition and preventive care.

name: Child Vaccination
description: Administration of age-appropriate vaccines according to the recommended immunization schedule. Our pediatric team ensures safe vaccination practices and provides education on vaccine benefits and potential side effects.

name: General Health Check-up
description: Comprehensive physical examination to assess overall health status. Includes vital signs measurement, system review, basic laboratory tests, and personalized health recommendations.

name: Telemedicine Consultation
description: Virtual healthcare consultation with our qualified physicians via secure video conferencing. Convenient for follow-ups, minor health concerns, prescription refills, and medical advice without visiting the clinic.
